Package com.iontrading.mkv.qos

Class MkvLogFileQoS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.qos.MkvLogFileQoS
  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public class MkvLogFileQoS
extends Object
    A configuration class for the log on file service.

    This class contains a set of properties which can be passed for customizing MkvLog file created via the createLogFile method.
    Some properties overrides global ones. Others are Java specific and can be setted only using this class.

    See Also:
    MkvLogManager

      • setFormat

        public void setFormat​(MkvLogFormat format)
        Set the file format.

        Default is MkvLogFormat.ASCII.

        Parameters:
        format - the format to set.
        See Also:
        MkvLogFormat

      • getFormat

        public MkvLogFormat getFormat()
        Returns this MkvLogFileQoS format.

        this MkvLogFileQoS format.

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel​(int i)
        Set the debug level.

        Default is 3.

        Parameters:
        i - the level to set

      • setAsynchronousMode

        public void setAsynchronousMode​(int flushInterval,
                                int bufferLimit)
        Set the asynchronous management code.

        This mode offers poor reliability but very low latency. Log methods will never block even in case of file system delay or failure.

        Parameters:
        flushInterval - the interval (millisecs) between flush actions.
        bufferLimit - the maximun memory (bytes) to use for buffering.

      • setLogsOutput

        public void setLogsOutput​(MkvProperties.LogsOutput logsoutput)
        Set the type of logging output.
        Parameters:
        logsoutput - FILE if the API shall log onto disk file, STDOUT or STDERR if the API shall log directly onto the standard output / standard error stream.

      • setSynchronousMode

        public void setSynchronousMode()
        Set the synchronous management code.

        This mode assures high reliability but may introduce high latency due to the underlying file system.

      • setBufferedMode

        public void setBufferedMode​(int flushInterval,
                            int bufferSize)
        Set the buffered management code.

        This method offers reduced reliability and medium latency. Write requests are buffered before to be processed by the underlying file system. Buffer may be auto-expanded as needed

        Parameters:
        flushInterval - the interval (millisecs) between flush actions.
        bufferSize - the maximun memory (bytes) to use for buffering.

      • getLogsOutput

        public MkvProperties.LogsOutput getLogsOutput()
        Returns the medium the API uses to log.
        Returns:
        FILE if the API logs onto disk file, STDOUT or STDERR if API logs directly onto the standard output / standard error stream.

      • setThreadIdTraced

        public void setThreadIdTraced​(boolean threadIdTraced)
        Sets the trace thread id mode for application logs.

        When the feature is enabled, the numeric id of the thread responsible of a trace is added to the trace itself. Only application logs are affected by this setting. Default is true.

        Parameters:
        threadIdTraced - true to include the thread id in the log traces.

      • isThreadIdTraced

        public boolean isThreadIdTraced()
        Returns true if the trace of the thread id is enabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the trace of the thread id is enabled, false otherwise.
